mapper.select: SELECT A.FCLT_MGMT_NO, B.FCLT_NM, ROUND(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV) * 100, 2) PRATE FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV A INNER JOIN TB_FCLT B ON (B.FCLT_MGMT_NO = A.FCLT_MGMT_NO) GROUP BY A.FCLT_MGMT_NO

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USR) TOT_CNT, SUM(FST_W_CNT) FST, SUM(SND_W_CNT) SND, SUM(TRD_W_CNT) TRD, SUM(FRT_W_CNT) FRT, SUM(FFT_W_CNT) FFT FROM ( SELECT @W := WEEK(A.REG_DTT,5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(A.REG_DTT, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(A.REG_DTT)-1 DAY),5)+1, CASE @W WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FST_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SND_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TRD_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FRT_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FFT_W_CNT FROM TB_USR A WHERE A.REG_DTT >= CONCAT(EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()),'01') AND A.REG_DTT <= LAST_DAY(NOW()) ) T

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV) TOT_CNT, SUM(FST_W_CNT) FST, SUM(SND_W_CNT) SND, SUM(TRD_W_CNT) TRD, SUM(FRT_W_CNT) FRT, SUM(FFT_W_CNT) FFT FROM ( SELECT B.RSRV_DT, @W := WEEK(B.RSRV_DT,5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(B.RSRV_DT, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(B.RSRV_DT)-1 DAY),5)+1, CASE @W WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FST_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SND_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TRD_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FRT_W_CNT, CASE @W WHEN 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FFT_W_CNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT RSRV_DT FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV A INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT C ON (C.RSRV_NO = A.RSRV_NO)) B ) T
